summary: This document is a bank statement from Fifth Third Bank for the account of Shocker Holdings LLC for the period of September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016. It details the account balance, service charges, and criteria for waiving those charges, indicating the financial status of the business during that time.

persons.name: Philip Finichre
persons.context: Philip Finichre is identified as the Relationship Manager for the account at Fifth Third Bank.

keyFacts: The statement covers the period from September 1, 2016, to September 30, 2016.
The beginning and ending balance for the account was $4,417.45.
A standard monthly service charge of $11.00 was waived.
The business maintained a total monthly average balance of $13,322.05 across its accounts.
The document indicates that the business did not meet the criteria for business credit card spending.
